Deal with custom page resources URL backward compatibility. Also there is a bug with qsappend="true" which always append query string using a &. Therefor the ?fix=true is used to fix that issue.
^/portal/custom-page/(.*)/themeResource$ %{context-path}/portal/themeResource?fix=true
${proxy-portal-js}
